```{r}
library(devtools)
library(dplyr)
#devtools::install_github("https://github.com/reichlab/cdcfluutils",force = T)
library(KCDETD)
state_data <-read.csv("../data/state_data.csv")
ma_data <- state_data[state_data$region == "Massachusetts",]

first_test_index <- 100
nsim <- 1000
kcde_fit <- fit_kcde(ma_data$unweighted_ili[1:(first_test_index-1)],ma_data$season_week[1:(first_test_index-1)],52,h=4)

preds <- simulate_with_backfill(kcde_fit,nsim,newX = ma_data$unweighted_ili[1:(first_test_index-1)],newt = ma_data$season_week[1:(first_test_index-1)],ts_frequency = 52,
                                        h=4,
                                        epiweek = ma_data$season_week[first_test_index-1],
                                        season=ma_data$season[first_test_index-1],region="ma")
                                      



```


```{r}
library(ggplot2)
ggplot(data=data.frame(y=c(t(preds)),x=rep(1:20,1000),group=rep(1:1000,each=20)),aes(x=x,y=y,group=group)) + geom_line() + geom_line(data=ma_data[100:103,],aes(x=20-4+ 1:4,y=unweighted_ili,group=1,col='truth'))
```
